effect_entries.effect:
Used in battle
:   Attempts to [catch]{mechanic:catch} a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 2×.

    If used in a trainer battle, nothing happens and the ball is lost.
effect_entries.short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon.  Success rate is 2×.

flavor_text_entries.text:
スーパーボールよりも　さらに
ポケモンを　捕まえやすくなった
すごく　性能のいい　ボール。

An ultra-high-performance Poké Ball
that provides a higher success rate for
catching Pokémon than a Great Ball.

Poké Ball dalle prestazioni eccellenti:
fornisce maggiori probabilità di cattura rispetto
alla Mega Ball.

Poké Ball de rendimiento superior. Tiene un
índice de éxito mayor al de la Super Ball.

Ein Ball mit hoher Erfolgsquote. Dem Superball in
allen Punkten überlegen.

Une Ball ultraperformante dont le taux de
réussite est supérieur à celui de la Super Ball.

수퍼볼보다도 더욱
포켓몬을 잡기 쉬워진
매우 성능이 좋은 볼.

スーパーボールよりも　さらに
ポケモンを　つかまえやすくなった
すごく　せいのうのいい　ボール。

An ultra-performance Ball that
provides a higher Pokémon catch rate
than a Great Ball.

provides a higher Pokémon catch rate

Super Ball.
